title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Technical deep dive: Composable AI agents for partner solutions (MAM217)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 技术深度剖析：合作伙伴解决方案的可组合AI代理 (MAM217)
abstract: Accelerate enterprise modernization through agentic AI and composability. This innovation enables migration and modernization competency partners to build differentiated solutions by combining their specialized tools, industry knowledge bases, and custom agents with powerful capabilities. Through an intuitive chat-based interface, AWS partners can create customized transformation solutions that reflect their unique value propositions for specific industries and customers. Each transformation further enhances our AI agents' intelligence, continuously improving their ability to handle complex enterprise environments. Join us for a technical deep dive to learn how you can leverage agentic AI to build differentiated migration and modernization solutions.
abstract_cn: 通过智能体AI和可组合性加速企业现代化。这项创新使迁移和现代化能力合作伙伴能够通过将其专业工具、行业知识库和自定义智能体与强大功能相结合来构建差异化解决方案。通过直观的聊天界面,AWS合作伙伴可以创建定制化的转型解决方案,反映其针对特定行业和客户的独特价值主张。每次转型都会进一步增强我们AI智能体的智能,持续提升其处理复杂企业环境的能力。加入我们的技术深度探讨,了解如何利用智能体AI构建差异化的迁移和现代化解决方案。

presenter.name: Murtaza Chowdhury
presenter.title: Head of Product Management, Agentic AI, AWS
